content.text: I love electronic music! I'm always listening to it. What are some of your favorite artists?
I love so many! I think my favorite is Deadmau5. He's so creative and innovative.
I love Deadmau5 too! He's one of my favorites too. I also really like Eric Prydz and Flume.
Oh yeah, Flume is great! I love his music. I also really like Odesza and Porter Robinson.
Those are all great artists! I love how electronic music can be so different and creative. It's not like any other genre.
I know, right? It's so versatile and there's so much to explore.
I love exploring new electronic music. It's always so exciting to find new artists and new sounds.
Me too! I love discovering new music. It's one of my favorite things to do.
What's the most recent new artist you've discovered?
I recently discovered an artist called DROELOE. I love their music. It's so dreamy and atmospheric.
Oh yeah, I know DROELOE! They're great! I love their song "Coming Home."
That's my favorite song by them too! It's so beautiful.
No, I haven't. I'm hoping to see them soon.
I hope you do! They're amazing live.
